column4: BRIEF-Daimler Trucks North America collaborates with AT&T  Microsoft Corp on new connectivity solutions
column5: * New collaborations with AT&T  Microsoft to deliver "enhancements" to detroit connect suite of connected vehicle services

column4: BRIEF-S. Africa's Competition Commission approves Foxconn unit deal to buy assets of Microsoft phone unit
column5: * S. Africa's competition commission says approved merger whereby FIH intends to acquire Vietnam and certain assets of Microsoft phone unit

column4: Henrik Fisker launches new electric car company
column5: Detroit Henrik Fisker  whose previous automotive venture collapsed in 2013 owing U.S. taxpayers $139 million  said on Tuesday he plans to launch a new electric car company next year to compete with Tesla.

column4: Henrik Fisker launches new electric car company
column5: Detroit  Oct 4 Henrik Fisker  whose previous automotive venture collapsed in 2013 owing U.S. taxpayers $139 million  said on Tuesday he plans to launch a new electric car company next year to compete with Tesla.
